1010001011100011 1101010111011000 1 -> sum: 0111100010111100, cout: 1
0101111011101010 0010101101100011 1 -> sum: 1000101001001110, cout: 0
1111000111011001 1011101101000101 0 -> sum: 1010110100011110, cout: 1
1011111101001100 0100000110110000 1 -> sum: 0000000011111101, cout: 1

1011110011001111 1111111101100001 0 -> sum: 1011110000110000, cout: 1
